eventanalysis Module¶

This program is for finding events in files and displaying the results.

plotData(plot_options)[source]¶

Plots waveform in datadict Pass in plot_options, filter_parameter dictionary with ‘plot_range’, ‘axes’, and ‘datadict’ pass in Data dictionary, with data at ‘data’ and sample rate at ‘SETUP_ADCSAMPLERATE’ Can pass in range as [start,stop], or ‘all’ for 0:n
